member.name: CERT_POLICY_MAPPING
member.summary: The CERT_POLICY_MAPPING structure contains a mapping between issuer domain and subject domain policy OIDs.

member.name: CERT_POLICY_MAPPING.pszIssuerDomainPolicy
member.summary: pszObjId of an issuer domain policy.

member.name: CERT_POLICY_MAPPING.pszSubjectDomainPolicy
member.summary: pszObjId of the equivalent subject domain policy.
